oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Makhārij al-ḥurūf : manuscript, undated
Maʻrifat makhārij al-ḥurūf wa-ṣifātihā
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jaʻbarī, Ibrāhīm ibn ʻUmar , 1242 or 1243-1331 or 1332
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Title from inside of front cover.
Written in one column, in a nastaʻlīq script in black ink, rubricated in red, 13 lines per page, with marginal corrections. Catchwords on the verso of each leaf.
Oriental paper. 17,7 x 13 cm. (11,5 x 8,5 cm.)
MS Arab 379. Houghton Library, Harvard University.

With: Adab al-kātib / li-al-Shaykh ʻAlam al-Dīn al-Sakhāwī (ff. 1r-29r) -- ʻAdad mā fī al-kitāb al-ʻazīz min al-āyāt ʻalá ḥurūf al-muʻjam (ff. 29v-31v) -- Dhikr maʻrifat aḥzāb al-Qurʼān wa-anṣāfihi wa-arbāʻih / li-al-Shaykh ʻAlam al-Dīn al-Sakhāwī (ff. 32r-36v).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Arabic language--Phonetics
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: جعبري، ابراهيم بن عمر، , 1242 or 1243-1331 or 1332
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: مخارج الحروف : مخطوطة، undated
معرفة مخارج الحروف وصفاتها
